scripts.seed: npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && psql -U postgres -d registration -c  "DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE;" && psql -U postgres -d registration -c  "CREATE SCHEMA public;" && psql -U postgres -d registration -c  "GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO postgres" && psql -U postgres -d registration -c  "GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO public;" && psql -U postgres -d registration  <db.sql
